name: tunnckocore.com
description: Official web of tunnckoCore Software, served by CloudFlare and GitHub Pages

scripts.precommit: yarn build && git status --porcelain && git add --all
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && echo 'tunnckocore.com' > docs/CNAME
